answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Pam,  
I found a great example of a volunteer program that has been developed by the City of San Antonio.  The STAR program that they developed has connected undergraduate students around San Antonio with valuable service projects that have benefited the city.  You can read all about the program here (http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/304220/Students_Together_Achieving_Revitalization), and I imagine that the communities on the Community Relations and Citizen Engagement topic pages would be able to clue you into volunteer ideas that have worked for them. 
Aloha, Best of luck,  
James Davidson 
Knowledge Network Intern

author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is researching what others are doing with volunteer projects/programs for University students. Specifically, what projects or programs do you engage university students?  How do you utilize university students (volunteer) in your local government? 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Volunteer Projects/Programs for University Students.
